item.description: After breaking for the month of July, we are ready to gather again. We have quite a few new members who have joined our group. We will spend some time in the beginning of the class introducing ourselves and getting to know each other. Then we will do a guided meditation together and have some discussion about what is the purpose of meditation for developing inner spirituality. It will be a warm evening of real conversation with people interested in learning meditation to know themselves more deeply. I'm looking forward to meeting you all!

group.name: Meditation & Inner Spirituality Group - New Haven

item.name: August Meditation & Spirituality Class
